column1: 25. Having considered the above matters of fact and law, I am of the view
that this is not a fit case to order a re-trial.
26. We set aside the disputed judgment dated 19.12.2019 and the sentencing
order, and acquit the appellants of the counts preferred against them.
27. The Registrar of this Court is directed to communicate this judgment to
the High Court of Panadura for compliance.
Judge of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
